actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1956 to allow for the donation of certain surplus commodities by the Commodity Credit Corporation to State and local penal institutions.

summary.text: Permits, under the Agricultural Act of 1956, the donation of surplus commodities by the Commodity Credit Corporation to State and local penal institutions (including the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1956 to allow for the donation of certain surplus commodities by the Commodity Credit Corporation to State and local penal institutions.
